main event: On 27 June 1962, a silver metallic object was sighted hovering 30-40 feet above ground in Fairborn, Ohio.
interesting points: The object hovered stationary for about 10 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing,No sound was heard during the observation,Three witnesses submitted statements regarding the sighting,The object had a dome-shaped top and was approximately 30-40 feet in diameter,There were no special effects observed during the sighting.
